title: Правила угона
overview: Sasha Volkov works on a HUNDRED, he wants to get rich and eventually open his own auto shop. Despite his young age, Alexander is a professional in the business, all my free time is dedicated Volkov machines. But about honest earnings Sasha can only dream of: the whole car business in the town controlled by two warring factions, one of which is headed by the Deputy and businessman Idris Dalakov, and the other the owner of the car-warehouse Vlad Botov.With the support of the authorities and the police manual, auto mafia has developed a special code — the rules of theft. Closing his eyes to the chaos, the most influential people of the city can not worry about the integrity of their cars.
